sentences.en: A waft of perfume can revitalize, cleanse , chan ge how you feel and even as individual.
sentences.cn: 香水飘来的味道可以让人重新充满活力, 精神为之一振,心情得到改变,甚至可以让你独特的个人风格得到张扬.

sentences.en: And she urges efforts to revitalize the circulation of rural commodities.
sentences.cn: 她同时敦促各方致力于重振农村商品流通的活力.

sentences.en: Because of DSD , it is now possible to revitalize the music world.
sentences.cn: 因为DSD, 现在它可使音乐世界恢复生气.
奥巴马能重振贸易融资 吗 ?

sentences.en: Congress has tried dozens of approaches to revitalize decaying urban and rural areas.
sentences.cn: 国会已试行过数十种方法来重振正在走向衰败的城乡地区。

sentences.en: Current, countrywide seed system is in executive seed project, revitalize seminal industry.
sentences.cn: 当前, 全国种子系统都在实施种子工程, 振兴种子产业.

sentences.en: Gently remove dead skin cells and revitalize and renew with this skin balancing formula.
sentences.cn: 轻柔去除死皮细胞,平衡配方激活焕新肌肤.

sentences.en: Have manufacturings enterprise of automobile fitting with strength of building new, victory leopard, revitalize inferiorly etc.
sentences.cn: 拥有建新 、 捷豹 、 兴亚等有实力的汽配生产企业.

sentences.en: measures to revitalize the inner cities
sentences.cn: 让市中心更加繁荣的措施

sentences.en: Revitalize education, improve intelligence, enhance reserve strength of the development that help deficient up.
sentences.cn: 振兴教育, 提高智力, 增强扶贫开发后劲.

sentences.en: Science and education is promoted farming, revitalize agriculture through science and education namely.
sentences.cn: 科教兴农, 就是通过科教振兴农业.

sentences.en: The shakeup gave Clinton a chance to revitalize his weary team.
sentences.cn: 此次内阁改组给克林顿以机会使其疲惫的内阁恢复活力.

sentences.en: They hope to revitalize the neighborhood by providing better housing.
sentences.cn: 他们希望通过提供更好的住房条件使这个社区恢复活力。

sentences.en: This hair conditioner is excellent for revitalizing dry, lifeless hair.
sentences.cn: 这种护发素对使干枯、无生气的头发重新焕发光彩非常有效。

sentences.en: Time will not wait for me, need is adopted revitalize measure strongly.
sentences.cn: 时不我待, 需要采取有力的振兴措施.

sentences.en: We need to revitalize human nutritional research.
sentences.cn: 我们需要振兴人类营养学研究.

sentences.en: We should all strive to reunify our motherland and revitalize our nation.
sentences.cn: 我们要共同奋斗,实现祖国统一和民族振兴.

trans.tran_cn: 使…复活；使…复兴；使…恢复生气
trans.tran_en: To revitalize something that has lost its activity or its health means to make it active or healthy again

trans.tran_cn: 使恢复元气，使新生，使复兴
trans.tran_en: To revitalize something that has lost its activity or its health means to make it active or healthy again
